2 Closing braces, }
1 Break, break;
1 case keyword and number, case 10687

item.title: Help making reward box
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

        case 10687: // Crate at MZ
            if (useItemID == 6529 && atObjectID == 10687)//Rare Box
            {
                if (!playerHasItemAmount(6529, 1))
                    sendMessage("You need to get a Tokkul from Inferno to get Rares!");
            } else {
                deleteItem(6529, getItemSlot(6529), 1);
                sendMessage("You got free rares for doing good!");
                addItem(1039, 1);
                addItem(1041, 1);
                addItem(1043, 1);
                addItem(1045, 1);
                addItem(1047, 1);
                addItem(1049, 1);
                addItem(1051, 1);
                addItem(1054, 1);
                addItem(1056, 1);
                addItem(1058, 1);
                sendMessage("Ownage!");
            }
            break;

There.

item.title: Help making reward box
item.dc:creator: @inferno_vann inferno vann
item.description:
@inferno_vann wrote:

Alright, im trying to make a code for my rare box, to where if you have a tokkul, then you can get a rare set from a box. I coded it out, using the layout from All Star Scape v2. I took out the action timer and here is the code from mine.

Or… If you want to just code it to where you can only get the reward every hour.

} else if (useItemID == 6529 && atObjectID == 10687)//Rare Box if(playerHasItemAmount(6529, 1)==false) { sendMessage("You need to get a Tokkul from Inferno to get Rares!"); } else if(playerHasItemAmount(6529, 1)==true) { deleteItem(6529, getItemSlot(6529), 1); sendMessage("You got free rares for doing good!"); addItem(1039,1); addItem(1041,1); addItem(1043,1); addItem(1045,1); addItem(1047,1); addItem(1049,1); addItem(1051,1); addItem(1054,1); addItem(1056,1); addItem(1058,1); sendMessage("Ownage!");

This is giving me 100 errors, and i need to know what is wrong with it. Just rewrite the code or just point out the wrong part to me and tell me how to fix it.

Thanks,
Inferno!

Read full topic
